title: India launches antitrust raids on Amazon sellers Cloudtail, Appario -sources
text: India's antitrust body launched raids at two top sellers of Amazon.com Inc over violations of domestic competition laws, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.

title: Amazon dips toe in 3rd-party delivery waters with Buy with Prime
text: About six years in the making and maybe not how it was originally envisioned, Amazon.com Inc. has opened its delivery doors to other online stores. Only time will tell how far Amazon goes with this.

title: Looking To Snap Downtrend, Can Amazon Deliver Results in Q1?
text: It's been a red year for tech. However, it's been an even tougher stretch for Amazon shares.

title: Amazon earnings preview: Analysts bullish despite rising costs and inflation
text: Amazon is facing rising costs, unionization efforts by warehouse employees, and a tight labor market.

title: Tech Stocks Are Key to Win Big in the Bear Market
text: Buying tech stocks as soon as they enter a bear market is key to win big. Over the past few decades, every time the Nasdaq reached that territory, it bounced back quickly and with vigor.

title: Will Solid AWS Momentum Aid Amazon's (AMZN) Q1 Earnings?
text: Amazon's (AMZN) first-quarter 2022 performance is expected to have benefited from AWS's portfolio strength and expanding customer base.

title: Amazon Just Revolutionized E-Commerce Once Again
text: The e-commerce giant also just might be thwarting growing competitive threats to its own business.

title: Investigation Reminder: The Schall Law Firm Encourages Investors in Amazon.com, Inc. with Losses of $100,000 to Contact the Firm
text: Los Angeles, California--(Newsfile Corp. - April 27, 2022) - The Schall Law Firm, a national shareholder rights litigation firm, announces that it is investigating claims on behalf of investors of Amazon.com, Inc. ("Amazon" or "the Company") (NASDAQ: AMZN) for violations of the securities laws.The investigation focuses on whether the Company issued false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose information pertinent to investors. Amazon is the subject of a report published by The Wall Street...

title: The Divergence Is Here
text: Ever since the Treasury yield curve inverted a few weeks back, everyone's talking about a recession. The post The Divergence Is Here appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Will Amazon's Crown Jewel Continue to Shine?
text: Investors might find out its dominance is waning.

title: Amazon Takes Another Step Toward Becoming a Logistics Company
text: Could its fulfillment network become the backbone of online retail?

title: Is Amazon's $1 Billion Investment in Industrial Innovation a Good Move?
text: Amazon announced it was creating a $1 billion fund for industrial innovation. That's good for AMZN stock, not so good for frontline workers.

title: Amazon: Evaluating The Stock Split, Growth Prospects, And Earnings
text: A number of studies indicate stock splits result in market beating gains. Amazon stock has underperformed the market by roughly 18% over the last 12 months.

title: 3 Things to Know About Amazon Ahead of Its Stock Split
text: Are share gains on the way?

title: Amazon warehouse collapse probe finds worker safety risks
text: U.S. regulators are calling on Amazon to improve its procedures for dealing with severe weather like hurricanes and tornadoes that could threaten workers at its warehouses dotted across the country.
